articles.author: Catherine Bosley, Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for May 13, 2024 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian stocks clawed back earlier losses as reports China is planning to start selling the first batch of its 1 trillion yuan ($138 billion) issue of ultra-long bonds boosted optimism the funds will help bolster the economy.
